DOC.brief_summary: There are two purposes on this study: - to investigate the effect of craniectomy and craniotomy on temporomandibular joint TMJ) movement, function and quality of life (QoL)
DOC.brief_title: Influences of Types of Skull Surgery on Temporomandibular Joint Performance
DOC.criteria: over 20 years old postcraniotomy or postcraniectomy able to follow order severe orofacial injury severe teeth loss significant changes of occlusion
